# List of museums in the Republic of the Congo

This is a list of museums in the Republic of the Congo.
Museums in the Republic of the Congo
* National Museum of the Congo
* Pointe-Noire Museum
* Kinkala Museum
See also
* List of museums
External links
* [http://www.nationsencyclopedia.com/Africa/Congo-Republic-of-the-ROC-LIBRARIES-AND-MUSEUMS.html Congo, Republic of the (ROC) - Libraries and museums]
